pageContext.claim: “Even our legislation that we did have passed, it failed in the Ninth Circuit; it failed in the Ninth Circuit appeal. It then won in the Supreme Court. And it's just a shame, because it's really hurting people. It's hurting our law enforcement tremendously. And now that the military is on the border, it's really hurting our military.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's travel ban was an executive order, not "legislation that we did have passed." It's not clear how the military Trump deployed to the border was hurt by this or any other judicial ruling.
